title: The Laundry's Ledger
description: The Laundry is a notorious front for the city's assassins. Following a dead-end from months ago, you finally deciphered the hit-contract ledger you found in the steam-tunnels.

turns.narrative: You confront the Laundry Master in his scalding, steam-filled office. The visibility is zero.
turns.choice_a: Use wind magic to clear the steam
turns.consequence_a: The air clears instantly, revealing three killers poised to strike.
turns.choice_b: Rely on your hearing and strike blindly
turns.consequence_b: A dangerous gamble. You strike one killer, but take a poisoned blade to the shoulder.

turns.narrative: The Laundry Master attempts to flee, throwing boiling lye behind him.
turns.consequence_a: You catch him, but suffer severe chemical burns to your legs.
turns.choice_b: Throw a bola or use a binding spell
turns.consequence_b: He trips and crashes into his own boiling vats, dying instantly.

master_captured.description: You suffered burns but captured the Laundry Master alive.

master_boiled.description: The Laundry Master died in his own vats.

conclusion: You suffered burns but captured the Laundry Master alive.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with significant consequences to the district and involved factions.
